1171200.name: Capsa - Pet Novelty Patterns Pack
1171200.description:
The Capsa - Pet Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your pet.

This pack of cosmetic items contains patterns for the cat clothing, and for the crab.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Cat Alien Patterns
  • Cat Camo Pattern
  • Cat Anarchy Pattern
  • Cat Heart Pattern
  • Cat I Believe Pattern
  • Cat Lifeguard Pattern
  • Cat Maple Leaf Pattern
  • Cat Paw Pattern
  • Cat Peace Pattern
  • Cat Pirate Pattern
  • Cat Shamrock Pattern
  • Cat Smiley Face Pattern
  • Cat Star Pattern
  • Crab Expression Patterns
  • Crab Roundel Patterns
  • Crab Anarchy Pattern
  • Crab Heart Pattern
  • Crab I Belive Pattern
  • Crab Lifeguard Pattern
  • Crab Mapple Leaf Pattern
  • Crab Paw Pattern
  • Crab Peace Pattern
  • Crab Pirate Pattern
  • Crab Shamrock Pattern
  • Crab Smiley Face Pattern
  • Crab Star Pattern
